text: Butterfly is the sixth album by American singer-songwriter Mariah Carey. It was released on September 16, 1997. The music on the album was different to Carey's previous albums as it was mainly hip hop sounding than her standard R&B; and "pop-soul" music. ==Track listing== == References == Category:Mariah Carey albums Category:1997 albums Category:Pop albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: Butterfly (Mariah Carey album)
